DatasetGenerators

Class GraphDatasetGeneratorAllowingMultipleMutations

  • java.lang.Object
    • DatasetGenerators.GraphDatasetGenerator
      • DatasetGenerators.GraphDatasetGeneratorAllowingMultipleMutations

  • public class GraphDatasetGeneratorAllowingMultipleMutations
extends GraphDatasetGenerator
    Extension of GraphDatasetGenerator that produces genotype graph where it is possible to have multiple acquisitions of mutations as a single event (when this happen is impossible to acquire part of them alone)
    Author:
    rossi

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      private void linkNodes()
      links each node with all the nodes with less mutations (and with no different additional mutation) and minimal Hamming distance to this node
      protected void prepareLinks()
      changed to generate also links with multiple mutations acquisition
